message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a unique opportunity to own a truly exceptional item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $25000.
I'm interested in the product, but $25000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $15000?
I understand that $15000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about we settle on $20000?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to consider a price of $18000?
I'm willing to make a bit more of a concession, but I'm still looking to get a good price for this product. How about we meet at $22000?
I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $18000 and $22000. How about we settle on $20000?
I'm willing to consider your compromise, but I'm not quite ready to settle on $20000. How about we meet at $21500?
I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $20500, but no higher. Can you meet me there?
I'm not willing to go any higher than $22000, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $20500 and $22000. How about we settle on $21250?
I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $20500 and $21250, but I think I can do better. How about we settle on $21000?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $22000, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $21000 and $22000. How about we settle on $21500?
I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $21000 and $21500, but I think I can do better. How about we settle on $21250?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $22000, and I think we're getting close to a deal. How about we meet exactly in the middle at $21500?
I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $21000 and $22000, but I think I can do better. How about we settle on $21125?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $22000, and I think we're getting close to a deal. How about we meet exactly at $21750?
